DOC.brief_summary: Purpose of this study is to determine the incidence of deep venous thrombosis after partial knee replacement.
DOC.brief_title: Doppler Ultrasound Following Unicondylar Knee Replacement to Determine the Incidence of Postoperative DVT
DOC.detailed_description: Doppler Ultrasound will be performed 2-6 weeks after surgery.
DOC.criteria: Unilateral partial knee replacement Postoperative anticoagulation with aspirin 325 twice daily Regional anesthesia Inflatable garments worn during hospitalization Bilateral partial knee replacement
